explains: n. 清洁剂；清洁工；擦亮粉；使清洁的东西
wordGroup: facial cleanser 洗面奶；洁面乳

sentences.en: Dried paint giblets can be wiped off by paint cleanser.
sentences.cn: 干燥的油漆残余物可用油漆清洁剂擦掉。

sentences.en: Chewing gum, once bought primarily by adolescent boys, is now featured in commercials as a breath freshener and teeth cleanser for use after a meal.
sentences.cn: 曾经主要由青少年购买的口香糖，现在在广告中被用作饭后的口气清新剂和牙齿清洁剂。
